member.name: T:UniFlash.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:UniFlash.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:UniFlash.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:UniFlash.Main.FlashText(System.Int32,System.Action{System.Windows.Forms.Control},System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Flashes the text of a control by toggling its color Red and Blue
member.param: The interval in milliseconds to flash the text
The function to handle the control's text color
member.remarks: Requires a Timer object to be created and initialized
member.exception: Thrown when the flash interval is less than or equal to 0
Thrown when the handler function or control is Nothing
Thrown when the Timer object is not initialized
Thrown when an unknown error occurs

member.name: M:UniFlash.Main.FlashErrorMsg(System.String)
member.summary: Flashes an error message in the LabelErrorMsg control
member.remarks: Requires the LabelErrorMsg control to be created and initialized
member.exception: Thrown when the error message is empty or Nothing
Thrown when the LabelErrorMsg control is not initialized
Thrown when an unknown error occurs

member.name: M:UniFlash.Main.GetValidFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the entered file name is valid and corrects it if necessary. Returns the full path of the file.
member.returns: The full path of the file
member.remarks: Requires the file name to be at least 5 characters long
member.exception: Thrown when an unknown error occurs

member.name: M:UniFlash.Main.ReplaceInputStringWithCharsFound(System.String@,System.Char[],System.String)
member.summary: Replaces characters found in the input string with the replacement character. Returns the inputString as reference and the replaced characters as a string
member.param: The input string to modify, passed as a reference
member.returns: The replaced characters as a string
member.remarks: Requires the referenceStringToModify to be passed by reference
member.exception: Thrown when the referenceStringToModify is empty or Nothing
Thrown when an unknown error occurs
